<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Celestial Armor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=149)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Good" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=83" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 557 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 2,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Chain Mail](/Armor.aspx?ID=9)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This suit of _+2 resilient [chain mail](/Armor.aspx?ID=9)_ is made of fine white links of a strange and slightly translucent pale metal, and the sleeves and skirt are fashioned into smaller trails that resemble feathers. Unlike normal chain mail, celestial armor has no Speed reduction, its armor check penalty is 0, and its Bulk is 1. 

 You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws against fiends. You appear radiant while you wear the armor, giving you a +2 item bonus to Diplomacy checks against all creatures except fiends.

 If you are not good, you are drained 2 while wearing _celestial armor_. You can’t recover from this condition while wearing the armor.

<document level="2" id="action-105" />

**Craft Requirements** You are good.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Celestial Armor
